profileAlternative.name: Pavel Ivanovich Ubiera Marrero
profileAlternative.headline: Lead Logical DBA and SQL Server "SME" at Ryder System, Inc.
profileAlternative.summary:
More than ten years like application developer, database administrator and project manager in a wide variety of business applications. Interested in client/server and relational database design using MS-SQL Server environment automatization using PowerShell, VB.net programming and business intelligence using SQL server and office platform.

Specialties: SQL DBA
Experience with SQL Tuning and Performance Tuning
Perform system installation, monitoring, backup, and support
Experience with reporting and analysis services (SSRS, SSAS, SSIS).
Gathering and analyzing business requirements
Designing data services and data model
Designing business requirement
VB.Programming
PowerShell
